label: CustomEntityAlias
description: A complex object that can be used to specify alternative spellings or synonyms to the root entity name.

fields.label: Accent Sensitive
fields.tooltip: Determine if the alias is accent sensitive.

fields.label: Case Sensitive
fields.tooltip: Determine if the alias is case sensitive.

fields.label: Fuzzy Edit Distance
fields.tooltip: Determine the fuzzy edit distance of the alias.
